definition.value:
Resource Type Key
This resource type key/name value can not be changed

Resource directory
Directory locating resource for this type. If changed, existing resources will not be acceccible and will need to be copied to new directory!

Default icon
Icon image to be shown in the listing of resources (Location: /image/... ).

Allowed file extensions
Regex with a list of allowed file extensions for this resource type
Success: You have updated resource type!
Error: Resource type name needs to be between 2 and 40 charcters
Error: Resource type directory needs to be between 2 and 64 charcters
Error: Resource type icon needs to be between 2 and 64 charcters
Error: Resource type file extenions regex needs to be between 2 and 40 charcters
